AFAIK, you *can* download it from the rockstar classics website.. You get a bundle of GTA1, some other old game and GTA2. 
I'm downloading at the moment, with 500kb/s speed.

Or, no, I was wrong.
You can download GTA1, Wild Metal and GTA2 individually from http://www.rockstargames.com/classics/ .
Just click on the picture of the game you want, fill in some bogus stuff and click submit. Accept their terms, and you're downloading.

Here are the PC version system requirements:

Pentium 200 MHz or above 
32 MB of RAM 
65 MB of hard disk space 
4x CD-ROM drive 
Windows 95/98 
DirectX 6.1 
Direct3D-compatible graphics card 
Sound card (3D sound card optional) 
Multiplayer: LAN (IPX & TCP/IP) 4 players plus Internet (via DirectPlay) 
Keyboard
